title: Assassins are essentially getting huge itemization nerfs because of ADCs
body: Fuck tons of lifesteal/spellvamp because BT isn't enough I guess. Damage nerfs so you can't burst as hard. Last Whisper only gives armor pen to BONUS armor. Runaan's can crit because we want Kalista to be ebola in its purest state. Tiamat passive removed because fuck Kha'Zix getting isolation. Seriously, the changes right now are so biased towards ADCs, and most of them deliberately fuck over assassins. Might as well remove every assassin if these changes somehow go through. But god damn are these unpolished, thank god they're only the first set of the dozens of changes that happen every season (I mean, just look at last year's preseason and compare it to now or even just the beginning of season 5)

To me it looks like every class that isn't an ADC (and maybe supports) comes out worse from these changes.

Both bruisers and assassins look to be losing some of their itemisation, bruisers lose Tri to ADCs and Black Cleaver to assassins and to a lesser extent they lose Maw to casters like Riv. Assassins do gain BC and Maw, but they look to lose a lot of their other options.

Mage items are getting across the board price increases and they lose out on mana pots, which hurts mages and mage supports disproportionately to other classes.

Tanks lose out on a lot thanks to just how stupid ADC items are going to be. As it turns out an item that makes armour useless and makes HP useless hurts tanks a lot.

I don't understand how people are so butthurt about the mana pots. I'm SILVER and I know how to conserve mana, so when I see people buy the pots I laugh at them. That's gold that could get an item faster, or a ward. And all that means for me (not buying the pot that is) is that I have to auto attack for a little while. What a nightmare.

{{champion:110}} Mid is a perfect example.
Sure i could conserve mana, AA to farm mostly and throw the occassional Q poke....Or i could come back to lane with 5{{item:2004}} and throw Q at my enemy laner every time it's off CD to poke them out of lane very quick.
But is that good to go against? I think thats Riot's argument here. Is it fun for a champion designed to be gated around mana to become nearly manaless for a limited time?
That is....a really good point actually. It's kinda BS to be able to get around being mana gated for a measly 175g. I fully support every upcoming change honestly, i think it'll be very refreshing.

I'll be honest; I don't care the assassins don't get to build Last Whisper for squishies. That's how it should have been to begin with, really. Assassins are supposed to kill *squishies* , not ***Tanks.*** 
Letting assassins build Last Whisper to not only get more efficient at killing ADCs and Mages but ALSO letting them murder Tanks? Das not how it should be. Tanks should counter Assassins. So should bruisers.

One could argue that I am a mere Silver 5 Saltpile who hates assassins and wants them dead and gone, since I seem particularly biased due to not even playing assassins... But I'mma disprove that, because I KNOW Assassins are an important role. Assassins have a place in the game, even if I absolutely despise facing the likes of Talon and Yasuo. They also have a really fun fantasy to play; Sneaking around and flanking the enemy team, dispatching key targets in a split-second, then getting out. BUT! Nothing in the "Assassin" fantasy says "Murder everyone". That's god-mode fantasy, and that would only be fun for the player doing it, no one else.

Not all assassins have been nerfed. {{champion:238}} has actualy been buffed. Not only {{item:3071}} is a better item for him now, but {{item:3157}} has been made weaker AND more expensive, discouraging mages to build it on more situations, but unfortunately for them they still need it against Zed.

Zed also really like the extra AD from {{item:3142}} which is now a better overall item for him. He is also not affected by the {{item:3077}} nerfs since he rarely use {{item:3074}} anyway.

Zed also has the Executioner's Calling back, allowing him to fuck sustain-based mages that would normally be counters to him like {{champion:8}} and {{champion:50}}.

The new {{item:3153}} and {{item:3035}} changes will be a problem for him, though. Overall, I predict that Zed will be the assassin who will be the least negatively affected by the changes.

I am not defending Zed, though. I actually hate when he is viable and strong. He is so much oppressive.
